mesquite.lib

Class ColorDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • mesquite.lib.ColorDistribution

  • public class ColorDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to indicate how something is to be colored, either an array of colors to be shown in equal pieces, or same with distribution of weights for pie slices. A maximum number of MAXCOLORS colors may be shown.

      • setSequential

        public void setSequential(boolean s)
        sets whether or not the colors are sequential, e.g. as for stochastic character mapping. In this case the weights are the point at which the change occurs, e.g. proportional position on branch

      • getSequential

        public boolean getSequential()
        returns whether the colors are to be considered sequential
